message.content: {"id": "2120", "title": "Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)", "description": "", "OB": "Files in the MRU list are not appearing in the File menu between sessions.", "EB": "The MRU list should persist the files between sessions.", "SR": "Implement the IPersistableElement to properly persist the MRU list. Do not access the underlying resource directly through implementation details. Note that the IEditorInput may not necessarily be a resource."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '2120', 'title': 'Bug 2120MRU File List is not persisted between sessions (1GE71Z0)', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Notice how files do not appear in File menu MRU list.These files should be persisted between sessions.NOTES:DS (5/23/01 3:36:30 PM)Note: We should be using the IPersistableElement.Do not peek into theimplementation to get the underlying resource.The IEditorInput may not bea resource. ', 'SR': ''}
